hackathon-description-text: is your chance to meet like-minded innovators, crank out a cool app in a matter of hours, and most of all - have fun! In this 8 hour hackathon, teams of 1-3 architects, developers, designers, data scientists, database ninjas, DevOps warriors, IT admins and tech-savvy business folks will join forces in a rapid prototyping sprint and attempt to win the admiration of their peers.
hackathon-requirements: Show up to the event and create an awesome hack. All submissions must be submitted on the ChallengePost wiki.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1x HP Stream x360 laptop (Includes Office 365 Personal one-year subscription, plus 1TB of OneDrive cloud storage for a year) (3 max.)

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: All who participants successful deploy onto HDP

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1x HP Stream 11-p010nr x360 Convertible 11.6-Inch Laptop with Office 365 for each member of the HP Haven Challenge winning team (3 max).

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=425 Summer Street, Boston, MA 02210, USA
hackathon-description-header: Hack Day is a one day hackathon sprint to build an app using the latest technologies HP has to offer to win some amazing prizes!
